Description:
Detects suspicious Django web application framework exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

Author: Thomas Patzke
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Django Framework Exceptions
Query: sourcetype like 'django-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%suspiciousoperation%' or log like '%disallowedhost%' or log like '%disallowedmodeladminlookup%' or log like '%disallowedmodeladmintofield%' or log like '%disallowedredirect%' or log like '%invalidsessionkey%' or log like '%requestdatatoobig%' or log like '%suspiciousfileoperation%' or log like '%suspiciousmultipartform%' or log like '%suspicioussession%' or log like '%toomanyfieldssent%' or log like '%permissiondenied%')
